addAnimation

public static Bitmap[][] addAnimation(java.lang.String src)
Used to add an animated bitmap

Parameters:
src - The location of the bitmap file
Returns:
A bitmap used for rendering. The Bitmap[] holds Bitmap[]s for each animation, e.g.
Bitmap[][] myBitmap = addAnimation(srcString); return myBitmap[animationId][frameId];

src - The location of the bitmap file
Returns:
A bitmap used for rendering

reflectField

public static java.lang.Object reflectField(java.lang.Object o,
                                            java.lang.String s,
                                            java.lang.Object value)
Sets a reflected field that would otherwise be hidden

Parameters:
o - The instance that holds the field to be reflected
s - The name of the field to be set
value - The new value for the field
Returns:
The field's new value. It is successful if it returns 'value'.

newEntity

public static Entity newEntity(double x,
                               double y)
Returns a new instance of an Empty Entity for JS or others to manipulate; i.e:
newEntity(x,y).getSpeed = new function return 1.5;

Parameters:
x - x position to spawn
y - y position to spawn
Returns:
new instance to modify

Entity, EmptyEntity
